column2:
"[<%me>] [Welcome]
[Meet you again] [glad]
[Praise to Ter'Jotr!]"

"[Woman scientist] [not with you]
[Unfortunate] [only slightly]"

"[Dragorii tribesmen] [complaining]
[woman scientist] [extremely rude]"

"[Hi tribe] [slightly annoyed]
[Ko tribe] [outraged] [dangerous]
[Ko tribe] [recommend eating] [woman scientist]"

"[Understand] [your good intentions]
[Dragorii] [not blind]
[Understand] [severity of situation]"

"[However] [understanding] [restricted by pride]
[Ko tribe] [extremely proud]"

"[Because] [Hi tribe] [accept you]
[Ko tribe] [never accept you]"

"[ARKS] [cause of problem] [they believe]
[Refuse] [listen to reason]"

"[Stubbornness] [useless] [not constructive]
[However] [cannot be changed]"
"[Tradition] [the old ways] [become a burden]"

"[However] [I am hopeful]
[<%me>] [will change] [Dragorii]"

"〔<%me>〕
〔よく来た〕〔再会を〕
〔テリオトーに〕〔感謝する〕"

"〔あの研究者は〕〔別行動か〕
〔いささか〕〔残念だ〕"

"〔我らから〕〔不満が出ている〕
〔曰く〕〔甚だ無礼であると〕"

"〔ヒは〕〔まだいい〕
〔だが〕〔コは憤慨している〕
〔食らってしまえ〕〔とも聞いた〕"

"〔そなたたちに〕〔悪意はないだろう〕
〔我らとて〕〔愚かではない〕
〔状況は〕〔理解している〕"

"〔だが〕〔理解を〕
〔誇りが〕〔縛りつける〕
〔コは〕〔特にそうだ〕"

"〔ヒは〕〔認めた〕
〔だからこそ〕〔コは認めぬ〕"

"〔アークスは〕〔災厄を招く〕
〔そう判断し〕〔認めようとしない〕"

"〔それは〕〔無為で〕〔無益である〕
〔だが〕〔変えられぬ〕
〔流れでもある〕"

"〔我らを〕〔縛る〕
〔しがらみであり〕〔鎖だ〕"

"〔それでも〕〔我は期待する〕
〔そなたが〕〔我らに〕
〔変化をもたらすと〕"
